changelog.title: Latest updates
changelog.heat_details: {LINK} is a Twitch extensions allowing viewers to click on your stream. Twitchat makes it dead easy to use it.

highlights.d:
Show animated text on your stream with the new dedicated overlay. A sort of equivalent to StreamElements alerts.

Use Triggers to show any text you want when you want.

Create custom Hype Trains based on tips from external platforms.

Mostly made for DJs that will soon lose most of their revenues, this allows them to benefit Hype Trains while actually earning money

Create quick polls chatters can vote on directly from the chat. Differences with native Twitch polls:
  • Title is optional
  • No automod
  • Up to 20 answers
  • Allow chatters to vote for multiple answers
  • Allow only subs/mods/vips/etc to vote
Comes with a dedicated overlay.

Create up to 100 timers and countdowns. Comes with new overlay for basic customization and a new render style for countdowns. Timers's states will be restored after reloading Twitchat. You could use it to create Subathon by adding time to a countdown everytime subs or bits are received.

‚ö†Ô∏è Not to confuse with grok from the nazi fucker! DISCLAIMER: Nothing will be sent anywhere unless you specifically request it! Groq claims not to store nor use your prompts for training. This integration allows you to request chat or conversations summaries in a blink or automate moderation tasks from the Triggers. Twitchat anonymises usernames before asking summaries.

New buttons:
  • Highlight top-most Q&A entry on overlay
  • Skip top-most Q&A entry
  • Close !alert message (see settings => chat features => enable chat alerts)

Twitch cut-off a service Twitchat was "abusing" to receive undocumented events. It's time to say goodbye to pinned messages and community challenge contribution notifications as well as related triggers.
Viewer count will only update every 5 minutes.

10 new labels available on the Labels overlay.
  • Generic follower ID, name and avatar (last follower for all platforms)
  • TkTok follower name and avatar
  • YouTube follower name and avatar
  • Twitch/YouTube/TikTok viewer counts

Each action can now have its own conditions. 9 new trigger events:
  • Start/end of a Chat Poll
  • Overlay highlighted message closed
  • Someone answers a message
  • Goal complete (see Goals overlay)
  • Voicemod: Enable/disable "Hear my voice"
  • Voicemod: Enable/disable "Voice changer"
6 new trigger actions:
  • Groq AI action
  • Mark message as spoiler
  • Control timers
  • Stop trigger execution
  • Start chat poll
  • Show/hide animated text

Many other things have been added or modified.
Read complete changelog here

Even though I recently accepted a job offer, Twitchat has been my main activity for almost 3 years without any other source of income.

If you can afford it, a one-time donation on PayPal or a monthly support on Patreon would be super appreciated ‚ù§Ô∏è
